tooltip.aquaticexploration.ancient_shell:
What secrets does it hold?
Maybe I should try washing it in water.
chat.aquaticexploration.shell_pickup: As you entered the water, you found a curious looking shell covered in dirt.
chat.aquaticexploration.not_ocean:
I washed the shell in water, but with little effect.
Maybe only the ocean can decipher the secrets in the shell.
